definition[0]: the joint where your arm bends
definition[1]: the part of a shirt etc that covers your elbow
definition[2]: a curved part of a pipe
definition[3]: to push someone with your elbows, especially in order to move past them
example[0]: She pushed through the crowd, elbowing people out of the way.
example[1]: He elbowed his way to the bar and ordered a beer.
note[0]: elbow your way through/past/into etc something
